transcript: when you're like really doing the diet hacks I'd eat my stuff with a baby spoon cuz it would just take longer to eat it cuz I was so hungry and I would put like one tablespoon of butter into uh Cream of Wheat and it was like 300 calories but it was a very filling 300 calories throw a little cinnamon on there Splenda and cinnamon vanilla all those are calorie free that was like my treat
